title: Dimon Says Paris Is JPMorgan’s New EU Trading Hub
itunes:title: Dimon Says Paris Is JPMorgan’s New EU Trading Hub
description:
Bloomberg News Wall Street Reporter Sonali Basak talks about Paris becoming JPMorgan's main trading center in the European Union. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek P&I Reporter Devin Leonard share Devin's Businessweek Magazine story How Netflix’s Lupin Pulled Off the Perfect Heist (Show). Jamie Metzl, Senior Fellow at the Atlantic Council, explains why he is calling for an investigation into China's connection to the outbreak of the Covid-19 virus. Richard Fain, CEO of Royal Caribbean Cruises, discusses the cruise line returning to sea after a 15 month shutdown. And we Drive to the Close with Dave Gilreath, CIO at Innovative Portfolios. 

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
